(nation park) wind cave locat custer county, south dakota, usa nearest&#160;c hot springs, south dakota coordin 43°33′23″n 103°28′43″w﻿ / ﻿43.55635°n 103.47865°w﻿ / 43.55635; -103.47865coordinates: 43°33′23″n 103°28′43″w﻿ / ﻿43.55635°n 103.47865°w﻿ / 43.55635; -103.47865 area 33,847 acr (52.886&#160;sq&#160;mi; 13,697&#160;ha)[1] establish januari 9, 1903 visitor 538,394 (in&#160;2011)[2] governing&#160;bodi nation park servic black hill badland sculptur mount rushmor crazi hors geolog format badland needl devil tower bear butt spearfish canyon mountain harney peak cave wind cave jewel cave parks, forests, grassland wind cave custer state park black hill nation forest black elk wilder buffalo gap nation grassland lake sylvan pactola v e calcit boxwork wind cave. boxwork result differenti dissolut intens fractur vein limeston cave formation. bison graze prairi grass wind cave nation park unit state nation park 10 mile (16&#160;km) north town hot spring western south dakota. establish 1903 presid theodor roosevelt, seventh u.s. nation park first cave design nation park anywher world. cave notabl display calcit format known boxwork. approxim 95 percent world' discov boxwork format found wind cave. wind cave also known frostwork. cave also consid three-dimension maze cave, recogn densest (most passag volum per cubic mile) cave system world. cave current sixth-longest world 140.47 mile (226.06&#160;km) explor cave passageways,[3] averag four new mile cave discov year.[cit needed] ground, park includ largest remain natur mixed-grass prairi unit states. content 1 earli knowledg 2 sourc cave' name 3 earli explor tour 4 surfac resourc 5 see also 6 refer 7 extern link earli knowledge[edit] lakota, cheyenne, nativ american tribe travel area awar cave' existence, earli euro-american settlers, evid yet discov anyon actual enter it.[4] lakota (sioux), indigen peopl live black hill region south dakota, spoke hole blew air, place consid sacr site first emerg underworld live demiurg creation world.[4] first document discoveri cave white american 1881, brother tom jess bingham heard wind rush 10-inch (25&#160;cm) 14-inch (36&#160;cm) hole ground. accord story, tom look hole, "wind" (exit cave air) blew hat head.[5] sourc cave' name[edit] cave said "breathe," is, air continu move cave, equal atmospher pressur cave outsid air. air pressur higher outsid cave it, air flow cave, rais cave' pressur match outsid pressure. air pressur insid cave higher outsid it, air flow it, lower air pressur within cave.[5] larg cave (such wind cave) small open "breathe" obvious small cave mani larg openings. rapid weather changes, accompani rapid barometr changes, featur western south dakota weather. fast-mov storm approach day bingham brother found cave, atmospher pressur would drop fast, caus cave' higher-pressur air rush avail openings, creat "wind" wind cave named. earli explor tours[edit] 1881 1889, peopl ventur far wind cave. 1889 south dakota mine compani hire jess d. mcdonald overse "mine claim" cave site. south dakota mine compani may hope find miner value, may start commerci develop cave mind.[6] valuabl miner deposit found, mcdonald famili began develop cave tourism. jess initi hire son alvin (age 16 1890) and, begin 1891, alvin' brother elmer, explor help develop cave.[7] alvin fell love cave kept cave diary.[8] other work wind cave help explor 1890 1903 includ kati stabler, emma mcdonald (elmer' wife), inez mcdonald (emma elmer' daughter), tommi mcdonald (brother elmer alvin).[4] februari 1892 cave open visitors;[9] standard tour fee appar $1.00,[10] signific sum money time. tourists, guide, explor cave candlelight. earli tour physic demand sometim involv crawl narrow passages. like nearbi jewel cave nation monument, current third longest cave, herb jan conn play import role cave explor 1960s. surfac resources[edit] unit state nation park ranger stand natur entranc wind cave. wind cave nation park protect divers ecosystem eastern western plant anim species. visibl anim includ elk (also call wapiti), bison, black-foot ferrets, pronghorn prairi dogs. wind cave bison herd one four free-roam genet pure herd public land north america. three herd yellowston park bison herd, henri mountain bison herd utah elk island alberta, canada. wind cave bison herd current brucellosis-free.[5] sever road run park 30 mile (48&#160;km) hike trails, almost entir park accessible. park estim 577,141 visitor 2010.[2] 109,000 peopl tour cave 2015, sinc 1968 cave tour limit 40 peopl each.[11] wind cave visitor center featur three exhibit room geolog cave earli cave history, park' wildlif natur history, work civilian conserv corp park. elk mountain campground, locat ponderosa pine forest, 1.25 mile (2.0&#160;km) visitor center. 75 site tent recreat vehicles. open year round campfir program offer summer limit servic avail winter.[5] march 2013, campground close due budget cut stem unit state budget sequestr law. however, decis close campground reversed, avail sinc may&#160;24, 2013.[12] one campground loop remain closed, even program campground amphitheater. see also[edit] jewel cave
